jd: From: Barla Santosh, Gacsol sbarla@gacsol.com Reply to: sbarla@gacsol.com HiHope you are doing well,I am reaching you regarding a below job opportunity, Title: AEM Dev LeadWork Location: BEACHWOOD, OH (Remote)Need Senior candidate 12+ yearsRoles and Responsibilities:Develop software solutions by: studying information needs; conferring with users; studying systems flow, data usage and work processes; investigating problem areas; and following the software development lifecycleParticipate in Sprint grooming sessions to analyze the requirements and implementation scopeImplement / develop the solution as per technical design and requirements in user storiesUnit test and commit codeAdvise and mentor junior and mid-levelsoftware engineers, and conduct code reviewsFix bugs and issues identified during QA cycleProvide production release and post release supportSkills needed: MUST be Very Hands-On with AEM ( 10+ years ), Excellent Java knowledge with starndard frameworks like JUnit, etc... ( +8 years ), Very good experience in Agile, Very good Angular knowledge ( +4 years ) , Cross national lead experience is a nice to have. Thanks,Barla SantoshTechnical RecruiterE: Sbarla@gacsol.com www.gacsol.com
